- [ HealthKit ](/documentation/healthkit)

-  HKMedicationDoseEventType 

Class# HKMedicationDoseEventType

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
class HKMedicationDoseEventType
```

## [Overview](/documentation/healthkit/hkmedicationdoseeventtype#overview)

Represents a recorded log of a specific medication, represented by HKMedicationDoseEvent samples.
